item.title: Handle Radial Pan Events in Flutter
item.description: A UI element that is not currently supported out of the box with Flutter is a click wheel, or knob, or radial control, rotatable circle, or whatever you want to call it. The following snippet demonstrates how to take a circular container, then detect which direction the user is rotating (clockwise or counter clockwise) and its velocity. Full wheel demo source code. Flutter Circular Pan Wheel Detect Pan Gestures Use a GestureDetector to wrap a container with a BoxShape.
